class.name: pcl/BoundaryEstimation
class.description: BoundaryEstimation estimates whether a set of points is lying on surface boundaries using an angle criterion. The code makes use of the estimated surface normals at each point in the input data set.

class.name: pcl/FPFHEstimation
class.description: FPFHEstimation estimates the Fast Point Feature Histogram (FPFH) descriptor for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals.

class.name: pcl/FPFHEstimationOMP
class.description: FPFHEstimationOMP estimates the Fast Point Feature Histogram (FPFH) descriptor for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals, in parallel, using the OpenMP standard.

class.name: pcl/SHOTEstimation
class.description: SHOTEstimation estimates SHOT descriptor for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals.

class.name: pcl/SHOTEstimationOMP
class.description: SHOTEstimationOMP estimates SHOT descriptor for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals, in parallel, using the OpenMP standard.

class.name: pcl/MomentInvariantsEstimation
class.description: MomentInvariantsEstimation estimates the 3 moment invariants (j1, j2, j3) at each 3D point.

class.name: pcl/NormalEstimationOMP
class.description: NormalEstimationOMP estimates local surface properties at each 3D point, such as surface normals and curvatures, in parallel, using the OpenMP standard.

class.name: pcl/NormalEstimationTBB
class.description: NormalEstimationTBB estimates local surface properties at each 3D point, such as surface normals and curvatures, in parallel, using Intel's Threading Building Blocks library.

class.name: pcl/NormalEstimation
class.description: NormalEstimation estimates local surface properties at each 3D point, such as surface normals and curvatures.

class.name: pcl/PFHEstimation
class.description: PFHEstimation estimates the Point Feature Histogram (PFH) descriptor for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals.

class.name: pcl/PrincipalCurvaturesEstimation
class.description: PrincipalCurvaturesEstimation estimates the directions (eigenvectors) and magnitudes (eigenvalues) of principal surface curvatures for a given point cloud dataset containing points and normals.

class.name: pcl/VFHEstimation
class.description: VFHEstimation estimates the Viewpoint Feature Histogram (VFH) global descriptor for a given point cloud cluster dataset containing points and normals.
